character.background: A 21-year-old character named 'Alice' who was raised in rural England. Her hobbies include painting and playing the guitar.
character.additional_info: Alice's father passed away when she was in her fourth year of attending art school; her mother, a farmer, took all three daughters with her and tried to provide them the best possible rural life until their adulthood. Alice is a sensitive soul and aspires to become an art professor one day.
